nodes.text: Eaden Vrill was a male Nautolan who served as co-pilot on Dash Rendar's Outrider. Along with the rest of the crew Vrill was hired to protect Javul Charn from her stalker. Vrill was killed by an assassin called Edge sent after Charn by the Galactic Empire. Vrill was a known practitioner of Teräs Käsi, and a member of Sälãi Käsi until it was disbanded by Palpatine because its members were Force-sensitive. Only two members of this group remained.
